rules_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
You may spend green mana as though it were mana of any color.
flavor_text:
[i]“It's customary to receive a token from your partner before they compete. This is my lady's.”
—Mila, Fredria's lover, and biggest fan[/i]
notes:
Old version:

When Lady's Favorite enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green.
T: Add G or one mana of the chosen color.

T: Add G.
You may spend green mana as though it were mana of any color.
